attributes.name: Arduino_LSM9DS1
attributes.author: Arduino <info@arduino.cc>
attributes.sentence: Allows you to read the accelerometer, magnetometer and gyroscope values from the LSM9DS1 IMU for Particle Devices.
attributes.paragraph: Allows you to read the accelerometer, magnetometer and gyroscope values from the LSM9DS1 IMU for Particle Devices.

readme:
= LSM9DS1 Library for Particle =

Allows you to read the accelerometer, magnetometer and gyroscope values from the LSM9DS1 IMU for Particle Devices.
